member.name: IRestrictedErrorInfo.GetErrorDetails
member.summary: Returns information about an error, including the restricted error description.
member.param: The error code associated with the error condition.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRestrictedErrorInfo.GetReference
member.summary: Returns a reference to restricted error information.
member.param: A reference to the error information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRestrictedErrorInfo
member.summary: Represents the details of an error, including restricted error information.
